body_html:
@martinwicke It seems that the saved_model_cli is a tool for only 'SavedModel' file. Therefore I make a seperate tool both for checkpoint and SavedModel and mainly for security.
We can add more security checks to this tool if any other security risks found in the subsequent tensorflow versions.
body_text:
@martinwicke It seems that the saved_model_cli is a tool for only 'SavedModel' file. Therefore I make a seperate tool both for checkpoint and SavedModel and mainly for security.
We can add more security checks to this tool if any other security risks found  in the subsequent tensorflow versions.
body:
@martinwicke It seems that the saved_model_cli is a tool for only 'SavedModel' file. Therefore I make a seperate tool both for checkpoint and SavedModel and mainly for security.
We can add more security checks to this tool if any other security risks found  in the subsequent tensorflow versions.
